# PoseProviding

**Protocol**

An observation that provides a collection of joints that make up a pose.

## Declaration

```swift
protocol PoseProviding
```

## Getting the joints

- **joint(for:)**: Retrieves a joint for a given joint name.
- **allJoints(in:)**: Retrieves a dictionary of all joints in the observation or joint group.

## Getting the joint names

- **availableJointNames**: The names of the available joints in the observation.
- **PoseJointName**: A type that represents a joint name.

## Getting the joint group names

- **availableJointsGroupNames**: The names of the available joint groupings in the observation.
- **PoseJointsGroupName**: A type that represents a joint group name.

## Body and hand pose detection

- **DetectHumanBodyPoseRequest**: A request that detects a human body pose.
- **DetectHumanHandPoseRequest**: A request that detects a human hand pose.
- **Chirality**: The hand sidedness of a pose.
- **Joint**: A pose joint represented as a normalized point in an image, along with a label and a confidence value.

## Conforming Types

- AnimalBodyPoseObservation
- HumanBodyPoseObservation
- HumanHandPoseObservation
